message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 near "ORDER": syntax error.
details:
[11-May-2025 20:53:35 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

SELECT p.*, m.meta_value as options, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name ORDER BY t.name ASC SEPARATOR ', ') FROM wp_term_relationships tr, wp_term_taxonomy tt, wp_terms t WHERE tr.term_taxonomy_id = tt.term_taxonomy_id AND tt.term_id = t.term_id AND tr.object_id = p.ID AND tt.taxonomy = 'post_tag') as tags FROM wp_posts p LEFT JOIN wp_postmeta m ON m.meta_key = 'gns_option' AND m.post_id = p.ID WHERE p.post_status = 'publish' AND p.post_type = 'post' AND p.post_date >= (NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY) ORDER BY p.ID DESC LIMIT 0,1000

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: SELECT p.*, m.meta_value as options, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.name ORDER BY t.name ASC SEPARATOR :param0 ) FROM wp_term_relationships tr, wp_term_taxonomy tt, wp_terms t WHERE tr.term_taxonomy_id = tt.term_taxonomy_id AND tt.term_id = t.term_id AND tr.object_id = p.ID AND tt.taxonomy = :param1 ) as tags FROM wp_posts p LEFT JOIN wp_postmeta m ON m.meta_key = :param2 AND m.post_id = p.ID WHERE p.post_status = :param3 AND p.post_type = :param4 AND p.post_date >= (NOW() - '+2 DAY') ORDER BY p.ID DESC LIMIT 0,1000 | parameters: , , post_tag, gns_option, publish, post
  3. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 near "ORDER": syntax error.
